mapper.select: /** BbsMapper.listBbsMst **/ SELECT BBS_SEN , BBS_TY_CD , FS_CMMN_CD_NAE(BBS_TY_CD) BBS_TY_NAE , BBS_NAE , BBS_DESCRIPT , SORT_ORD , DATE_FORMAT(INP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INP_DT FROM BBS_MST

/** BbsMapper.getBoard **/ SELECT A.BBS_SEN , A.PARENT_BBS_SEN , A.BBS_TY_CD , A.BBS_NAE , A.BBS_DESCRIPT , A.SORT_ORD , B.OPTN_SEN , IFNULL(B.GDNICE_USE_YN, 'N') as GDNICE_USE_YN , B.GDNICE_SCR , B.GDNICE_UPP_NUM , IFNULL(B.SCRTARTC_FNCT_YN, 'N') AS SCRTARTC_FNCT_YN , IFNULL(B.ANSER_FNCT_YN, 'N') AS ANSER_FNCT_YN , IFNULL(B.ANSWER_FNCT_YN, 'N') AS ANSWER_FNCT_YN , IFNULL(B.ANNYMTY_FNCT_YN, 'N') AS ANNYMTY_FNCT_YN , IFNULL(B.STTEMNT_FNCT_YN, 'N') AS STTEMNT_FNCT_YN , B.STTEMNT_FNCT_TS_NUM FROM BBS_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN BBS_OPTN B ON A.BBS_SEN = B.BBS_SEN WHERE A.BBS_SEN = #{bbsSen}
